sourcesContent:
import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react' import { Link, useHistory } from 'react-router-dom' import { listDecks, deleteDeck } from '../utils/api' export default function DisplayDeck({ deck }) { const {id, name, description, cards} = deck; const cardNum = cards.length const history = useHistory() const deleteHandler = async () => { if (window.confirm("Are you sure you want to delete this deck? You will not be able to recover it.")) { await deleteDeck(id); history.go(0) } } return (
{name}

{`${cardNum} cards`}

{description}

View Study
) }
